metadata.title: CVE-2019-3861 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 in theway SSH packets with a padding length value greater than the packet lengthare parsed. A remote attacker who compromises a SSH server may be able tocause a Denial of Service or read data in the client memory.

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
